thread.section_title: eDreams Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von eDreams | www.edreams.de
thread.title: Adrian Banks

author: Adrian Banks
title: Adrian Banks
text: The customer service representative that dealt with my issue when I called on 14.02 was extremely friendly and helpful. She switched to English to make sure I understood all the details we were discussing, which really helped to put me at ease. Based on the experience I had with her, I would be happy to use eDreams again for future reservations. This employee deserves a nice bonus for her dedication to her job and customers.
